Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.repository

Interface AuthorRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Author,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Author,​java.lang.Long> 
    @Repository
public interface AuthorRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Author,​java.lang.Long>
    Author Repository

    This class is responsible for communicating with the external database with author data

    Each function in this class is a custom defined command for the AuthorService class to issue SQL commands to the database. Updates and changes in this class must/should be represented in the AuthorService class respectively.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    Author, AuthorService, AuthorController
